title: Blaupunkt Cybersound 98 cm (40 Inch) HD Ready LED Smart Android TV with 40W Speaker  (40CSA7809)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, Remote, Wall Mount, User Manual, 2 AAA Batteries
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MP4, MPEG, MPG, MKV, AVI, FLV, ASF
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, MPEG1, MPEG2, MPEG2.5, AAC, HEAAC, ASF, WMA
product_specification.Other Audio Features: 4 Sound Mode (Standard, Music, Movie, Sports), Sound Output Device (TV Speaker, ARC, S/PDIF)
product_specification.Supported App - Others: More Than 6000 Apps and Games like Amazon Prime, Disney+Hotstar, Zee5, Sony Liv, EROS Now, MX Player AirPlay
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Android, Google Play Store with 6000+ apps and Games, Chromecast Built-in, Google Assistant, LIVE TV Channels, 20+ Content Partners
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Network PM44-11BP 100M Ethernet Support (10/100M, DHCP), Browser, Support HDMI-ARC
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Google Assistant Enabled Remote, Hot Keys of Sony Liv, Prime Video and YouTube
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: More Than 6000 Plus Apps and Games, Airplay, Chromecast, Google Play Store with 500,000 Plus TV Shows and Games, Google Assistant, Unlimited Content
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.High-quality Sound: Thanks to its 40 W inbuilt speakers, the Blaupunkt LED TV offers cinema-like sound for an engrossing aural experience. This TV also improves the overall audio quality by ensuring that the sound output is rich, crystal clear, and powerful.
product_description.HDR Picture: Courtesy of this TV's HDR picture quality, you can enjoy on-screen visuals with bright highlights, enhanced contrast, and realistic colours. And, by adjusting brightness levels frame by frame, this technology renders images with high nit levels, resulting in more lifelike visuals.

review: Not every smart tv is smart. This is what I realised after purchasing this product. Never ever get trapped by low cost. I could never imagined that a smart tv exists that doesn’t support Netflix. Seller and Flipkart have cleverly hidden it while you see the product on the app unless you go deeper and check the product description. Usually who does that! Above all when I highlighted this issue and even showed my willingness to pay whatever the amount is to replace it with a better tv, Flipkart didn’t support at all. This is the point one needs to be cautious as “policy” comes in the argument. So guys this is a lesson for every purchase you do on Flipkart.

First Thanks to Flipkart... Nice working... For My Replacement, they handled in nice... And about TV means, Very Nice and very simple to use .... Excellent picture quality.... Sound quality some what ok... Net connecting speed is also good... Blaupunkt people also in touch with me upto my work get to complete... All are good... Can buy without any hesitation...

I got this at 18999 on BBD. Happy to say, best best one this price range. One thing that makes me shocked is No Netflix support. Otherwise better one. Installation and delivery was very easily done.
. Picture quality is better
. Sound quality is amazing in tv speaker
. Apps support are better
. Connectivity is very easily


Cons
. No Netflix support
. Sound is less while connecting to home theater and sound bar via bluetooth

Overall at this price range it's a steal deal.

Installation was fine but took 4 days. Have used it for just 5 days, the product seems fine so far. Sound is fine not great as expected from Blaupunkt, maybe tweaking the equalizer will improve the quality, especially the base. Netflix doesn't work out of the box nor can it be installed from playstore but can be downloaded separately and installed from usb and run using sideload but navigation in Netflix doesn't work alright. Neither can chrome browser or Firefox be installed from the store, has some other web browsers but I haven't experimented with them. Has good support for connectors - input output. Good value for money overall compared to the rest in the budget segment. Have taken the extended warranty +2 yrs for 1099 plus shall be receiving 3 months additional warranty from the supplier so overall 3y 3m warranty is being expected, I hope the service is fine. The os/shell seems to be same as Thomson, Kodak.

Everything was on time, including the installation.
The delivery agent came, opened the box, showed us the main item and accessories and went away.
Nextday, the installation engineer came and installed.

Immediately after receipt, the TV was put to use
by putting it on the table easily using the two plastic support clips. Power cable was connected to the mains, and wifi password was given. Immediately, Android software with a size of 638 mb was installed. It took about half an hour. Although the 2x20 watt speakers are good, I preferred to connect my tower speaker with 6.5 "
Subwoofer to the TV. The pairing of bt speaker was very good and the bt connectivity is excellent.
Two full movies were seen for six hours, no lag was noticed at all. I do not have any dish tv connection
or cable TV connection. I am using it as smart TV only. The performance is very good for 32 inch TV HD viewing is fine. But now I am of the opinion Blaupunkt should have thought of making this a full HD TV. Overall, a good 32" inch Smart TV from Blaupunkt.

I was quite sceptical about buying this in the first place given that there are TV's in similar price range which offers same/similar features but then I was aware of Blaupunkt making exceptional headsets and soundbar so I thought to take a chance given price point. I must say this is one of the best decisions that I have made so far in choosing an electronic device.

Picture Quality: 5/5 mind you it's a full hd tv and not 4K

Sound Quality: 5/5 this is the best sound in any tv at this price point or even in tv's of much higher segments than this.

Colour: 5/5 the colour looks very close to natural

Connectivity: 5/5 it offers you large number of connectivity options as mentioned in the specifications without any issues( I have tested all of them)

Inbuilt Apps: 4/5 as it doesn't offer Netflix and you can't download it from the the Playstore either.

Overall, I can say that it's a German quality you can trust, though it is purely made in India product (not just assembled)

It's a very Good TV for this price. Used for 1 week. Very cool and powerfull sound with 40 Watts. Great picture quality. Amazing viewing experience. It has ARC HDMI sound support for greater sound.

When I tried to play some videos, the TV was not supporting that format in terms of audio. So we can instal VLC or any other major players in the TV as it's an Android TV and we can easily play those videos with those apps.

I connected my amplifier with this TV and it worked great. Very easy wifi setup and connectivity.

If you are looking for pixel to pixel review you can see micro seconds delay in terms of playing videos from youtube through Chromecast. But you won't notice this if you don't watch it closely. I checked this because I have a separate Chromecast device for my previous TV.

Only downside I feel is that, it only has 1 year Warranty. If we can get extended warranty for 3 years then that would be a game changer.
